section.p: The Medical History dataset generally includes the subject's prior and concomitant conditions at the start of the trial. Examples of subject medical history information could include general medical history and gynecological history.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
The code value = ASSERTION

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
The start and stop date/times of the medical history event. [SDTM: MHSTDTC, MHENDTC]

SHALL contain [1..3] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of medical history items. [SDTM: MHSEQ, MHREFID, MHSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus)
Used to indicate whether the activity - occurrence of the medical history event - did occur. Use statusCode "Completed" if the use occurred. [SDTM: MHOCCUR]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CE
A code value and descriptive text to provide information on the nature of the mdical condition or event. [SDTM: MHTERM, MHMODIFY, MHDECOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the medical history item.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the medical history item is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] medicalHistoryCategory with data type medical History Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the medical history item is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] medicalHistorySubCategory with data type medical History Sub Category

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether collection of data regarding an event of this type has been pre-specified, usually on a reporting form.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pre-Specified Event (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.66)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the medical history item.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows identification of the relevant body system or organ class.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Body System or Organ Class (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.57)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the study day associated with an activity taking place during a single day.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Event Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.62)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the relationship between the end of the activity being recorded and a reference point defined for the study.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Activity End Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.54)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information, most particularly the timing, regarding the collection of data for an event. This is relevant especially in cases where the timing and duration of an event are distinct from that of data collection.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.59)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..3] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of medical history items. [SDTM: MHSEQ, MHREFID, MHSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
The code value = ASSERTION

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus)
Used to indicate whether the activity - occurrence of the medical history event - did occur. Use statusCode "Completed" if the use occurred. [SDTM: MHOCCUR]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
The start and stop date/times of the medical history event. [SDTM: MHSTDTC, MHENDTC]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CE
A code value and descriptive text to provide information on the nature of the mdical condition or event. [SDTM: MHTERM, MHMODIFY, MHDECOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the medical history item.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the medical history item is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] medicalHistoryCategory with data type medical History Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the medical history item is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] medicalHistorySubCategory with data type medical History Sub Category

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pre-Specified Event (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.66)
Used to indicate whether collection of data regarding an event of this type has been pre-specified, usually on a reporting form.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the medical history item.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Body System or Organ Class (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.57)
Allows identification of the relevant body system or organ class.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Event Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.62)
Used to record the study day associated with an activity taking place during a single day.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Activity End Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.54)
Records the relationship between the end of the activity being recorded and a reference point defined for the study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.59)
Used to capture information, most particularly the timing, regarding the collection of data for an event. This is relevant especially in cases where the timing and duration of an event are distinct from that of data collection.
